name: loading
description: Interactive theater web application designed to enhance the experience of theater performances by allowing participants to interact in real-time via a web-based platform.

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend/my-app"
scripts.install: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend/my-app && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend/my-app"
